statements: SELECT * FROM Signatures WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT collected_signature, reference_signature FROM Signatures WHERE signature_id > 10;
SELECT signature_id, collected_signature, reference_signature FROM Signatures WHERE collected_signature LIKE '%example%';
SELECT reference_signature FROM Signatures WHERE collected_signature IS NOT NULL ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Signatures WHERE collected_signature = 'abc' OR reference_signature = 'xyz' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Signatures WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT collected_signature FROM Signatures WHERE signature_id = 10;
SELECT reference_signature, collected_signature FROM Signatures WHERE signature_id < 5 ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Signatures WHERE collected_signature LIKE '%important%' AND reference_signature IS NOT NULL;
SELECT signature_id, COUNT(reference_signature) AS num_references FROM Signatures GROUP BY signature_id HAVING num_references > 2;
SELECT * FROM collected_signatures
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM collected_signatures
SELECT signature_data, signature_id FROM collected_signatures
SELECT * FROM reference_signatures
SELECT reference_data, reference_id FROM reference_signatures
SELECT * FROM collected_signatures WHERE signature_id = 1
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM reference_signatures WHERE reference_id = 5
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM collected_signatures WHERE signature_id IN (2, 3, 4)
SELECT signature_id, reference_id FROM collected_signatures INNER JOIN reference_signatures ON collected_signatures.signature_id = reference_signatures.reference_id
SELECT * FROM collected_signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Signatures;
SELECT reference_signature, collected_signature FROM Signatures;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM AuthenticationLogs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM Signatures ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT u.username, s.reference_signature FROM Users u JOIN Signatures s ON u.user_id = s.id;
SELECT u.username, a.timestamp FROM Users u JOIN AuthenticationLogs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions WHERE session_id = 3;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp, details FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 4;
SELECT collected_signature, reference_signature, verification_status FROM signatures WHERE signature_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE verification_status = TRUE ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%' AND LENGTH(password_hash) >= 60;
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 1001 AND login_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 2002 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, user_id, details FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN' OR event_type = 'LOGOUT' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CollectedSignatures;
SELECT signature_id, signature_data FROM ReferenceSignatures;
SELECT reference_id, reference_data FROM SignatureMatches WHERE match_result = true;
SELECT * FROM AuthenticationLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserAuthentication WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM CollectedSignatures;
SELECT reference_id, reference_data FROM ReferenceSignatures ORDER BY reference_id DESC;
SELECT collected_signature_id, reference_signature_id, match_result FROM SignatureMatches WHERE match_result = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM AuthenticationLogs WHERE user_id = 1234 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username FROM UserAuthentication WHERE password_hash = '123456'
